name: DreamWorld
headline: DreamWorld is âadult Minecraftâ with generative AI.
description: DreamWorld is âadult Minecraftâ with generative AI. Our players grew up on User Generated Content games, but are now 13-40 and have aged out Roblox / Minecraft. DreamWorld provides more powerful building tools, better graphics, and massive social multiplayer.

founders.name: Garrison Bellack, Founder
founders.description:
CEO of DreamWorld.

Competitive Gamer and Engineering Lead. Previously at Google, Meta, and Apple.

founders.name: Zachary Kaplan, Founder
founders.description:
CCO of DreamWorld.

Serial Entrepreneur and Creative Lead. 

Background in project management, product design and development, driving brand awareness, video production, and media/website design.

raw_markdown="[HOME](https://www.playdreamworld.com/</>)[UPDATES](https://www.playdreamworld.com/<https:/blog.playdreamworld.com>)[FAQ](https://www.playdreamworld.com/</about>)[CONTACT](https://www.playdreamworld.com/</contact>)
![](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/GraphicAssets/DWLogoColorSmall.png)
DREAMWORLD
THE INFINITE SANDBOX MMO. FOR BUILDERS, BY BUILDERS.
SIGN UP FOR THE ALPHA NOW!
Email Address
Password
Show PasswordAlready have an account? Log in
JOIN NOW
GAMEPLAY TRAILER
![](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/GraphicAssets/Header-style-graphic-left.png)
Dream Big, Build Bigger
![](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/GraphicAssets/Header-style-graphic-right.png)
Welcome to DreamWorld, a groundbreaking sandbox MMORPG that blurs the lines between fantasy and reality. In this vast, ever-evolving world, players awaken as mystical beings, venturing into a dynamic realm that seamlessly integrates elements of survival, sandbox, role-playing, city-building, and strategy games.Unlike traditional MMORPGs, DreamWorld empowers players to explore diverse play styles, from farming, hunting, and crafting to orchestrating the construction of cities and shaping the world through strategic prowess. The game's skill system allows characters to evolve based on individual preferences, ensuring a unique journey for every player.DreamWorld is a realm of collaboration, where players can unite to tame the wilderness, construct impressive towns and cities, and even forge empires across continents and oceans. In these higher echelons, DreamWorld transforms into a deeply social and strategic experience, where alliances are formed, and the destiny of entire virtual civilizations hangs in the balance. Welcome to DreamWorld, where imagination knows no bounds.
![edit](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/GraphicAssets/Stylish-arrow-down.png)
![](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/BackgroundImages/AI_King_Kong.png)
AI Text-to-3D Asset Generation
![Main section graphic](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/GraphicAssets/Main-Section-Graphic-Left.png)
Create and build anything you can imagine by using our revolutionary DreamForge
![edit](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/GraphicAssets/Stylish-arrow-down.png)
![](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/BackgroundImages/DreamWorldForestRiver.png)
Explore a Vibrant World
![Main section graphic](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/GraphicAssets/Main-Section-Graphic-Right.png)
Embark on an adventure across diverse landscapes, from enchanted forests to bustling cities. Venture into uncharted territories filled with mystery and treasures.
![edit](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/GraphicAssets/Stylish-arrow-down.png)
![](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/BackgroundImages/CopyPasteTower.png)
Build Amazing Structures
![Main section graphic](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/GraphicAssets/Main-Section-Graphic-Left.png)
Unleash your architectural prowess and construct jaw-dropping structures. Create awe-inspiring castles, intricate bridges, and gravity-defying towers.
![edit](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/GraphicAssets/Stylish-arrow-down.png)
![](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/BackgroundImages/Social_Image_2.png)
Connect, Collaborate, Conquer
![Main section graphic](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/GraphicAssets/Main-Section-Graphic-Right.png)
Join forces with others to build grandiose projects. Form alliances and team up, leaving your permanent mark on the world.
![edit](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/GraphicAssets/Stylish-arrow-down.png)
![](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/BackgroundImages/Vyne-2.png)
Battle Valiant Foes
![Main section graphic](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/GraphicAssets/Main-Section-Graphic-Left.png)
Test your skills in epic battles against fearsome monsters and colossal bosses. 
![edit](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/GraphicAssets/Stylish-arrow-down.png)
![Discord logo](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/SocialMedia/Discord_logo.svg)
Join the Discord community to connect with developers, stay updated on the latest changes, and collaborate with fellow builders. Your voice matters in shaping DreamWorld!
JOIN THE DISCORD
![](https://www.playdreamworld.com/assets/img/new_design/GraphicAssets/Header-style-graphic-left.png)

generated_description:
**DreamWorld: An Infinite Sandbox Game for Adults**

Welcome to DreamWorld, a 2021-founded company that elevates the sandbox gaming experience to new heights, merging the nostalgic elements of games like Minecraft and Roblox with empowering, adult-friendly tools. Picture this: you’re not just playing a game; you’re crafting your own universe, complete with powerful building tools and stunning graphics designed for a more mature audience.

### The Vision

DreamWorld positions itself as “adult Minecraft,” enriched with generative AI capabilities. Its mission is clear: cater to players aged 13 to 40 who have outgrown traditional user-generated content games. This platform isn’t just about playing; it’s about creating, exploring, and socializing in a boundless world where imagination reigns supreme.

### Features That Stand Out

- **Expansive Gameplay**: Players take on the role of mystical beings, diving into a vibrant realm filled with survival elements, city-building, and strategy gameplay. You can farm, hunt, craft, and even team up to construct entire cities or empires. 
- **Dynamic Collaboration**: This is where social interaction shines brightest. Players can unite to conquer challenges, build grand projects, and leave a permanent mark on the world—everyone's contributions matter.
- **Innovative Tools**: Their proprietary tool, DreamForge, utilizes AI for text-to-3D asset generation, allowing for unparalleled creativity. Create awe-inspiring castles or intricate towers that challenge the limits of architectural imagination.

### Community and Connectivity

Based in Redwood City, CA, with a compact team of 20 people, DreamWorld fosters a strong community vibe. The developers encourage player feedback via their Discord channel, keeping the interaction going and allowing players to influence the game’s evolution. 

### Growth and Recognition

DreamWorld is a proud participant of Y Combinator's Batch W21, gaining traction in the gaming sector as a pioneering social MMORPG. Their ambition to bridge the gap between fantasy and reality through powerful user-generated content tools is already resonating with players looking for a deeper, more meaningful gaming experience.

### In Summary

DreamWorld isn’t just a game; it’s a canvas for creativity, community, and exploration. It invites you to join in the alpha phase now, ensuring that as they build this expansive world, you’re a part of that dream. 

For more details or to sign up, visit their website: [DreamWorld](https://www.playdreamworld.com/). 

In a realm where constraints fade and imagination soars, DreamWorld is carving a new path for adult gamers. Welcome aboard!
